name: Pepe on SOL
description: PEPE the frog, from face value you would look at this and the think it is just another derivative of the pepe on eth. In a way it is, it uses the same image but its on a completely different chain. Also having it on sol makes the barrier to entry a bit lower for newer folks trying to get in. The community seems to have a second wind here a wants to run with this one, multiple people are creating websites and other tools to add to the ecosystem. This is not a case of which one is better more less some crypto heads mashing their creative skills together and this is the result.
